scripts.win:set-sh: npm config set script-shell 'C:\Program Files\Git\bin\bash.exe' && npm config get script-shell
scripts.kloc-api:scale: bash scripts/k8s/k-deploy.sh -- n=mern-js-api ns=mern-js sn=2 ae=local
scripts.kloc-web:scale: bash scripts/k8s/k-deploy.sh -- n=mern-js-web ns=mern-js sn=2 ae=local
scripts.kloc-api:env: bash scripts/k8s/k-env.sh -- n=mern-js-api ns=mern-js c=./backend ae=local
scripts.kloc-web:env: bash scripts/k8s/k-env.sh -- n=mern-js-web ns=mern-js c=./frontend ae=local
scripts.kloc:config: npm run kloc-init:config && bash scripts/k8s/k-config.sh -- f=k8s/local/prod/app
scripts.kloc-api:rollout: bash scripts/k8s/k-deploy.sh -- rt=restart n=mern-js-api ns=mern-js ae=local
scripts.kloc-web:rollout: bash scripts/k8s/k-deploy.sh -- rt=restart n=mern-js-web ns=mern-js ae=local
